subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Draymond Green has always been known for his defense, but he has emerged as the N.B.A.’s most unheralded triple-double threat since Lever, whose prime was short but memorable.
snippet: Draymond Green has always been known for his defense, but he has emerged as the N.B.A.’s most unheralded triple-double threat since Lever, whose prime was short but memorable.
